name: Irminsul
description:
In Irminsul, you have to plant trees to feed the World Tree. The world is separated in 3 biomes that have different ressources available for the plants to harverst. You have to manage you ressources as the trees and the World Tree consume ressources. All trees are connected to the World Tree. Your goal is to make a sustainable environnement so that the world tree can prosper.

You can move the camera with ZQSD.
